00008 #ifndef HELGEN_FAC_H_
00009 #define HELGEN_FAC_H_
00010 
00011 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00012  * Helicity generator factory specialisation for the istream class, creating *
00013  * a helicity generator instance from a filestream.                          *
00014  *                                                                           *
00015  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00016 
00017 #include <Camgen/static_conf.h>
00018 #include <Camgen/uni_hels.h>
00019 #include <Camgen/long_hels.h>
00020 
00021 namespace Camorra
00022 {
00024 
00025     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>class helicity_generator_factory
00026     {
00027         public:
00028 
00029             typedef typename model_t::value_type value_type;
00030             typedef helicity_generator<typename model_t::value_type,N_in,N_out,model_t::continuous_helicities> generator_type;
00031             typedef helicity_generators::type generator_tag;
00032 
00033             static const bool ch=(model_t::dimension==0)?false:(model_t::continuous_helicities);
00034 
00037 
00038             static generator_type* create_instance(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it)
00039             {
00040                 return create_instance(it,helicity_generator_type());
00041             }
00042 
00045 
00046             static generator_type* create_instance(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it,generator_tag tag)
00047             {
00048                 switch(tag)
00049                 {
00050                     case helicity_generators::uniform:
00051                         return uniform_helicities<value_type,N_in,N_out,rng_t,ch>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00052                     case helicity_generators::longitudinal:
00053                         return longitudinal_helicities<value_type,N_in,N_out,rng_t,ch>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00054                     case helicity_generators::summation:
00055                         return helicity_summer<value_type,N_in,N_out,ch>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00056                     default:
00057                         return NULL;
00058                 }
00059             }
00060 
00063 
00064             static generator_type* create_instance(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it,std::istream& is)
00065             {
00066                 std::string initline,endline;
00067                 do
00068                 {
00069                     std::getline(is,initline);
00070                 }
00071                 while(initline!="<helgen>" and !is.eof());
00072                 if(is.eof())
00073                 {
00074                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before initial data are read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00075                     return NULL;
00076                 }
00077                 generator_type* result;
00078                 std::string type;
00079                 is>>type;
00080                 if(type=="sum")
00081                 {
00082                     result=helicity_summer<value_type,N_in,N_out,ch>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00083                 }
00084                 else if(type=="uniform")
00085                 {
00086                     result=uniform_helicities<value_type,N_in,N_out,rng_t,ch>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00087                 }
00088                 else if(type=="longitudinal")
00089                 {
00090                     result=longitudinal_helicities<value_type,N_in,N_out,rng_t,ch>::template create_instance<model_t>(it);
00091                 }
00092                 else
00093                 {
00094                     LOG(warning)<<"helicity generator type "<<type<<" not recognised..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00095                     result=NULL;
00096                 }
00097                 if(result!=NULL)
00098                 {
00099                     result->load(is);
00100                 }
00101                 do
00102                 {
00103                     std::getline(is,endline);
00104                 }
00105                 while(endline!="</helgen>" and !is.eof());
00106                 return result;
00107             }
00108     };
00109     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>const bool helicity_generator_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>::ch;
00110 }
00111 
00112 #endif /*HELGEN_FAC_H_*/
